field.name: description
field.value: When a string literal parameter with a C# escape character (e.g. '\') gets passed in as a parameter to a subView tag the resulting string used in the C# code that gets generated by the AspView engine does not encode or escape the character. I don't think we ought to force users to escape their parameter using the C# syntax when using a pseudo html construct like the subView tag. If they want to use escape characters in their parameter strings when rendering a subView, let them call OutputSubView directly in C#.
